greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of non-constant integer partitions of n whose mean and geometric mean are both integers.
comment: The Heinz numbers of these partitions are given by A326646.
xref: Partitions with integer mean and geometric mean are A326641.
Heinz numbers of non-constant partitions with integer mean and geometric mean are A326646.
Non-constant partitions with integer geometric mean are A326624.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jul 16 2019
